BlackNightmare:

The femme smiled and drank her energon. She still was worried about 
Injustice, it isn't normal that he was far of her for so long... it 
war weird, she felt calmed when she knew where he was and what he 
was doing... but when he was out sight,she has an uneasy feelling 
that he was planning something against Malice and her sister 
scratches was a...

BlackNgihtmare stopped and realized that she was acting as a fool, 
perhaps some rest would be better for her
